name: Bonte Books
overview:
Professional Photo Books and Self Publishing

Binding: Each book is hand bound beautifully and designed to last. We guarantee it.

Linen Covers: An amazing array of colors (go wild and pick raspberry - we dare you!)

Paper: Archival Quality 80 lb. Silk Paper. The ideal paper for photo printing and binding which, under normal conditions, will not fade.

Options Galore: Follow our easy-to-use software to create a photo book or use our self-publish PDF-to-book side to upload your next recipe book, novel or children’s book - it’s up to you!
